Uses of Class
gamecore.entity.EntityBuilder

  • Packages that use EntityBuilder 
    Package Description
    gamecore.entity  

    • Uses of EntityBuilder in gamecore.entity

      Methods in gamecore.entity that return EntityBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityBuilder EntityBuilder.experience(int experience)
      Each Entity has an experience amount corresponding to its relative power.
      EntityBuilder EntityBuilder.setInventory(gamecore.Inventory inventory)
      Be default, each new Entity will be provided with an empty Inventory appropriate to their stats.
      EntityBuilder EntityBuilder.setSalt(int salt)
      The Salt is used to make each individual Entity unique.
      EntityBuilder EntityBuilder.setStatMap(java.util.Map<Attribute,java.lang.Integer> statMap)
      By default, stats will be determined at random.
      EntityBuilder EntityBuilder.setWeapon(Weapon weapon)
      By default, a new Entity will be equipped with a basic, 1-power Dexterity weapon.
      EntityBuilder EntityBuilder.statsNotRandom()
      stats are usually determined at random upon Entity creation.
      EntityBuilder EntityBuilder.statsToBuff(Attribute... attributesToBuff)
      If one or more stats should be slightly higher then the others when they are generated, invoke this method and pass them through.
      EntityBuilder EntityBuilder.statsToNerf(Attribute... attributesToNerf)
      If one or more stats should be slightly lower then the others when they are generated, invoke this method and pass them through.
